entry.title: Pioneer V2051040-O/S - Ultra Cooling Towel V2051040-O/S
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pioneer
Type: Cooling Products
Price: 8.48

[shortdesc]

Ultra Cooling Towel

  • 100% PVA foam, ultra-absorbent helps dissipate hot moisture and body heat
  • Activated by soaking into cool water and gently wringing out excess water
  • Packed in hangable plastic tube to keep product cool, soft and reusable
  • Can be tied around head or neck to keep you cool
